name: ORS NOMIS Business Data Offender Update Report
description: CAD0009 - v00.00.07 This report lists the database activity performed during a specified period for a prisoner. The report prompts for the NOMS Number of a prisoner and a from and to date for the reporting period.

dataset.name: Business Data Update
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AUDITREF.OFFENDERS.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AUDITREF.OFFENDERS.LAST_NAME, AUDITREF.OFFENDERS.FIRST_NAME, AUDITREF.OFFENDERS.MIDDLE_NAME, AUDITREF.OFFENDERS.MIDDLE_NAME_2, AUDITREF.STAFF_MEMBERS.LAST_NAME, AUDITREF.STAFF_MEMBERS.FIRST_NAME, nvl(AUDITREF.STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS.USERNAME,'N/A'), nvl(AUDITREF.STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS.STAFF_USER_TYPE,'N/A'), AUDITREF.STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS.WORKING_CASELOAD_ID, AUDITDATA.AUDIT_TABLE.AUDIT_CLIENT_USER_ID, AUDITDATA.AUDIT_TABLE.AUDIT_CLIENT_IP_ADDRESS, AUDITDATA.AUDIT_TABLE.AUDIT_CLIENT_WORKSTATION_NAME, trunc(AUDITDATA.AUDIT_TABLE.AUDIT_TIMESTAMP), to_char(AUDITDATA.AUDIT_TABLE.AUDIT_TIMESTAMP,'HH24:MI:SS.FF3'), AUDITDATA.AUDIT_TABLE.AUDIT_MODULE_NAME, AUDITDATA.AUDIT_TABLE.LCR_OBJECT_NAME, AUDITDATA.AUDIT_TABLE.LCR_COMMAND_TYPE, ALL_AUDIT_COLUMN.LCR_COLUMN_NAME, CASE ALL_AUDIT_COLUMN.LCR_COLUMN_OLD_NEW_IND WHEN '1' THEN 'New Value' ELSE 'Old Value' END, auditdata.getrefdata(ALL_AUDIT_COLUMN.LCR_COLUMN_NAME,ALL_AUDIT_COLUMN.LCR_COLUMN_VALUE), AUDITDATA.AUDIT_TABLE.AUDIT_TABLE_SEQ FROM AUDITDATA.AUDIT_COLUMN ALL_AUDIT_COLUMN, AUDITDATA.AUDIT_TABLE, AUDITREF.STAFF_MEMBERS, AUDITREF.STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS, AUDITREF.OFFENDERS, AUDITDATA.AUDIT_OFFENDER_REF WHERE ( AUDITREF.STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS.STAFF_ID=AUDITREF.STAFF_MEMBERS.STAFF_ID ) AND ( AUDITREF.STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS.USERNAME=AUDITDATA.AUDIT_TABLE.AUDIT_USER_ID ) AND ( AUDITDATA.AUDIT_TABLE.AUDIT_TABLE_SEQ=AUDITDATA.AUDIT_OFFENDER_REF.AUDIT_TABLE_SEQ and AUDITDATA.AUDIT_TABLE.LCR_SOURCE_TIME=AUDITDATA.AUDIT_OFFENDER_REF.LCR_SOURCE_TIME ) AND ( AUDITDATA.AUDIT_OFFENDER_REF.OFFENDER_ID=AUDITREF.OFFENDERS.OFFENDER_ID ) AND ( AUDITDATA.AUDIT_TABLE.AUDIT_TABLE_SEQ=ALL_AUDIT_COLUMN.AUDIT_TABLE_SEQ and AUDITDATA.AUDIT_TABLE.LCR_SOURCE_TIME=ALL_AUDIT_COLUMN.LCR_SOURCE_TIME ) AND ( ( AUDITDATA.AUDIT_TABLE.LCR_OBJECT_OWNER='OMS_OWNER' ) AND ( (AUDITDATA.AUDIT_TABLE.AUDIT_TIMESTAMP >= to_date('21-04-2023 00:00:00') AND AUDITDATA.AUDIT_TABLE.AUDIT_TIMESTAMP < to_date('22-04-2023 00:00:00')+1) ) AND auditdata.getrefdata(ALL_AUDIT_COLUMN.LCR_COLUMN_NAME,ALL_AUDIT_COLUMN.LCR_COLUMN_VALUE) Is Not Null AND ( AUDITREF.OFFENDERS.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY= 'A5361CT' ) AND AUDITDATA.AUDIT_TABLE.AUDIT_MODULE_NAME <> 'PRISON_API' )), dataset_ AS (SELECT FROM dataset_base_)

report.name: NOMIS Business Data Offender Update Report
